Description:
Brand New Home in Boutique Development
Located in Central Walk Estate, Drysdales new boutique residential development, this brand new family home offers an enviable, relaxed lifestyle - just 200 metres from the town centre. Working to a contemporary masterplan, the estate incorporates numerous views to nearby hills populated with mature eucalypts, plus a central reserve that features a creek running through stunning wetlands. Everything here looks as fresh as a daisy. Custom designed by a local builder, this quality home sits comfortably on the lower side of elevated Platinum Avenue, with a neat terraced front garden and a double lock-up garage. From the covered portico, a polished-timber passage leads down to the generous open-plan kitchen/dining/lounge area, while along the way is the master bedroom with its walk-in robe and sparkling ensuite, a lounge/entertainment room with double doors, and a laundry equipped with plenty of cupboard space. The kitchen boasts premium appliances including twin Westinghouse electric ovens, a Technika 5-burner gas cooktop, an Omega dishwasher, and island bench with two sinks, and a walk-in pantry. The lounge/dining section opens onto a covered deck thats made for made for outdoor dining and entertainment. Adjacent to this main living hub are three more bedrooms which share the main bathroom (bath and shower) and a separate WC. Theres remotely controlled heating and cooling throughout, plus a split system and ceiling fans. As the name Central Walk suggests, its an easy walk to just about everything youll need - shops, schools, cafes and restaurants. This is a great opportunity to make a new start in a new home, in a new and vibrant precinct - with all the essentials on your doorstep.

Description:
Large Townhouse Quiet Locale
Perfect opportunity for the first home buyer on a budget that still wants that something extra, for those scaling back (but not too much!) or the savvy investor seeking massive growth.
Quietly positioned in a key court location and consisting of three bedrooms, master with WIR and fully updated ensuite and central main bathroom, open plan kitchen meals and lounge room. With a real back yard and not just a courtyard. This delightful residence is perfect for entertaining.
Includes a single lock up garage, gas central heating and split system A/C.
Well positioned within easy distance to Gateway Plaza, Leopold Primary, Leopold Community Hub and public transport.
For the value seeking, now is the time to book your inspection.

Description:
STUNNING LUXURY LIVING WITH VIEWS!
Situated merely metres from the picturesque coastline of Clifton Springs is this magnificent family home built with exceptional attention to detail. Stunning bay views are captured from the upstairs open plan living and dining space which flows out seamlessly to a brilliant outdoor entertaining area equipped with ceiling fan for those balmy summer nights. Upstairs further comprises an amazing kitchen with quality appliances, stone bench top and full butlers pantry, powder room and Master suite complete with bay views, WIR and ensuite with double vanity & insitu shower. Downstairs features 3 generous bedrooms all with BIRs, a formal living space at the front of the home and kids activity/3rd living with access to the lush rear garden at the rear of the home plus a gorgeous central bathroom with freestanding bath. Outside enjoys double car accommodation with drive through access to the rear and a lovely low maintenance garden allowing you more time to enjoy the beautiful Bellarine Peninsula! Further features of this stunning home include zoned security system, zoned ducted heating through out, Split System, an abundance of storage, quality window furnishings, solar panels and ducted vacuum system. This fabulous home is one not to be missed, book your inspection today!

Description:
Coastal Zen
This home away from home will leave you coming back for more! If you are seeking the ideal weekender, you have comfort with the convenience of the Bay at the end of the road. If you are looking to downsize, the astute floor plan has bedrooms and bathrooms both upstairs and down. A savvy investment both long term or, if you want to go down the holiday letting path this is set up and ready to go for peak season.
Entry level buying has never been so enticing, you are not only securing a piece of the Bellarine but all that comes with the coastal lifestyle.
One of two custom built townhouses, separately titled and set across two levels . The ground level welcomes you with timber floors and an uplifting palette of colour, a fantastic space to entertain or curl up with a book.
The designer kitchen comes with all the mod cons and is ideal for cooking up a storm. Overlooking the dining and family room, this design allows you to entertain in style and interact whilst in the kitchen. The lofted ceiling and plethora of light gives this area a sense of comfort and relaxation, access onto the sun-drenched deck is a perfect touch.
Two spacious bedrooms both equipped with built-in- robes and access to a private deck. A well- appointed central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry complete the lower level.
Upstairs steals the show, boasting a stunning master bedroom with its own parent's retreat, ensuite and walk in robe complete with second living area.
Your comfort is assured in this great home, with ducted heating and great airflow, gorgeous easy-care polished concrete and hardwood flooring, ample storage, double lock up garage with remote and internal access low maintenance gardens back and front. Quality workmanship upgraded fixtures and fittings and attention to detail obvious throughout.
This chic townhouse offers low maintenance living and is situated close to schools, shops, public transport and the Bay.
A lifestyle opportunity not to be missed.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Ideal First Home, Downsizer or investment!
This impressive 4 bedroom or 3 plus extra living, 2 bathroom, DLUG home has everything you need and more. Ideally suited to those looking for a quiet location to potentially downsize or would make a great investment with a rental return expected around $400pw approx. The layout has the master bedroom at the front. This features an oversized shower recess in the ensuite and a generous walk in robe. Moving past the internal access to the garage is the laundry to the left and the further 3 bedrooms all with built in robes which are easily located to the family bathroom. Beyond this is the open plan kitchen, dining and lounge. The kitchen features waterfall benchtop, with stainless steel appliances and ample storage. The kitchen looks out to the dining and lounge room and further to the low maintenance garden and outdoor area. Other features include central gas heating, split system air-conditioning and ceiling fans. This really is a lovely package. Ready to move into with nothing to do. This one won't last so be quick to inspect!
- Close to public transport
- Short drive to Leopold Shopping Centre, Schools and gateway to the Bellarine Coast
- Central heating
- Split system cooling
- Rent $400pw approx

Description:
COMFORTABLE HOME IN A BRILLIANT LOCATION!
This is the perfect opportunity to secure a lovely home in a brilliant location in highly sought after Clifton Springs! Featuring 3 comfortable bedrooms, a spacious living area, renovated modern bathroom and laundry plus fabulous designer kitchen overlooking the beautifully manicured north facing rear garden, this home is sure to please astute investors, first home buyers and downsizer's alike! Other fantastic features of this fabulous home include a reverse cycle split system, gas heater, ceiling fans and an enclosed double car port. Call for an inspection today!

Address: 187 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
OVERLOOKING THE GOLF COURSE
Imagine looking out your back windows at the lush green of the Clifton Springs Golf course that you do not even have to take care of? High secure fencing around so the balls stay on the course. This home backs onto the Clifton Springs Golf Course, where you can watch the golfers on the 15th green.
Step back in time to an entrance of slate. From the entrance it opens on to Kitchen,meals,living where the views begin. Climatically controlled by gas central heating and electric cooling. Upstairs there are two bedrooms also with views.
Direct access to entrance via garage. Side access to park the boat, trailer or caravan. Good off street parking.
Established area of Clifton Springs, the suburb that is no longer hidden, it has been discovered.
Started as a satellite city approx. 50 years ago it was slow to grow. When the dual highway was put right through from Leopold people decided it was not that far to commute. Why would you not choose to live on a north facing bay with views?

Description:
When Style & Convenience Is Paramount!
Offering the perfect blend of stylish and low-maintenance living, this home will delight from the very first glance!
Positioned in a quiet street, youll appreciate that lifes essentials are never far away. A short stroll will find you at the Ash Road shops, where you can meet a friend for lunch, take care of your daily errands, or grab some last-minute groceries for dinner. Young children will love living a hop, skip, and a jump from the Myuna Reserve playground. Public transport and the Leopold Kindergarten are within walking distance from your front door, while Leopold Primary School and the Gateway Plaza are conveniently close by.
The immaculate interiors exude a breezy ambience throughout the home. An abundance of northern light sweeps through the open plan living zone, which overlooks the lush front lawn and leafy side garden. Creating a tranquil backdrop through every window, youll love relaxing in this light-filled living zone. The front timber deck also entices you to enjoy the fresh air and soak up the suns rays.
The kitchen exudes contemporary style with a breakfast bar, built-in pantry, and stainless steel appliances (dishwasher, oven, gas hob, and rangehood).
All three bedrooms boast mirrored built-in robes, while the updated bathroom is your very own slice of pampering heaven. Graced with feature floor-to-ceiling tiling, deep bathtub, and open shower, every inch of this space is perfection. The laundry and separate toilet complete the layout.
Youll be comfortable in all seasons thanks to a split-system air conditioner and ceiling fans.
The exposed aggregate driveway leads to the rear of the home, where there is dedicated off-street parking that can accommodate two vehicles.
With nothing left to do except move in and enjoy, this home will upgrade your lifestyle in a heartbeat! Inspect without delay!

Description:
VILLAGE POSITION ! WALK EVERYWHERE ! AS NEW!
Within walking distance of the Drysdale village, parklands and all amenities . Generous proportions as well as natural light enhancing the warm feel of this perfect villa. A spacious lounge room (north facing), adjacent dining and well equipped kitchen with double doors opening to the garden. Two bedrooms a king and a double, both with BIR'S, central bathroom, laundry and separate toilet . Features include walk in pantry, dishwasher, split system, loads of storage, new carpets, quality window furnishings and more. Single garage (direct internal access) as well as second access for another vehicle if required. Absolutely nothing to do , a real gem .

Description:
Stylish Sanctuary Offers Luxury and Space
The Feel:
Custom built to the highest levels of craftsmanship, this refined 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom, 3 living, triple garage residence was created with exacting specifications to maximise the northerly aspect, ensuring a comfortable, entertainer's lifestyle. Ideally positioned between the city and the coast, and set on a substantial 1220sqm allotment, this grand residence enjoys a private position in a quiet court location delivering on quality and elegance while providing easy, low maintenance living.
The Facts:
- Custom built 40 square 4BR home on 1220sqm (approx.) with ‘wow’ factor on entry
- Grand master bedroom with his & hers WIR, luxury ensuite including stone vanity, oversized shower with body jets &
step up spa bath
- Zoned spacious minor BRs with BIRs, family bathroom & laundry. Large 4th Bedroom doubles as study/home office
with built-in office storage & double wardrobe
- Luxury kitchen with showstopper 5mtr granite island waterfall breakfast bar
- Quality stainless steel appliances & instant boiling/filtered chilled water tap
- Incredible storage including floor to ceiling built-in pantry & dedicated appliance cupboard
- Spacious open plan kitchen, dining & living room with bespoke joinery, flowing through to third living
area/multipurpose room
- South wing (including formal living room/theatre room with gas log fire) separated from main living by luxury glass
feature doors
- Two outdoor entertaining areas with merbau decking, the main with built-in BBQ, s/s benchtop, wood heater, TV,
downlights and patio blinds
- Neutral tones including quality tiled flooring, & plush wool carpets in bedrooms and formal living room
- Comforts: Gas log fire, ducted heating/cooling climate control system, ducted vacuuming, 2 Rinnai gas continuous hot
water services
- Natural light filled, plus beautiful lighting plan throughout. Outside floodlights and sensor lights
- Tinted double glazed windows provide privacy, noise reduction & utility savings, with distinguished window treatments
(Roman blinds & roller blinds)
- Large laundry with stone benchtop, double linen cupboard, ironing centre and ample storage
- Triple garage (oversized double & single with interconnecting doors, direct access to house, and rear roller door to the
double). Additional fully powered double large workshop at rear
- 3 phase power, providing large electricity savings
- Aggregate driveway & pathways with established drought tolerant plants & screen trees
- 20,000L of rainwater storage with automatic watering system for gardens
- Potential for pool with sunny orientation (STCA)
- A few short minutes by car to school and Gateway Plaza shops
- 10mins to Geelong CBD & 13mins to beach & cafes in Ocean Grove
The Owner Loves….
"We love the aspect, quality and space of this home. We were drawn to the convenience and privacy this location offers, halfway between the lifestyle and amenities of both Ocean Grove and the city of Geelong."

Description:
Immaculate Home in Private Pocket
Nestled in a peaceful, private and well-established pocket of Leopold, sits this charming property that has been meticulously looked after and cared for. Conveniently located within walking distance to the ever-expanding Gateway Plaza, Sporting grounds, Leopold Primary School and public transport, this neat home offers convenience, functionality, space & low maintenance living.
Upon entry you are greeted with the formal lounge and from there the home just flows freely in the spacious interior. Offering three bedrooms, two bathrooms and open plan living. Positioned on 521m2 (approx.) with a double garage and immaculate/modern street frontage. The combined dining, kitchen and fully carpeted lounge is a perfect open plan design. The main bedroom offers a full ensuite & walk in robe. Remaining bedrooms include built in robes. Adding to the comfort of the home is the gas central heating and reverse cycle air conditioner.
Outside, is the expansive rear yard with established gardens and fantastic under covered entertaining area perfect for any sized gathering, the garden shed and palm trees complete the rear yard.
This home is ideal for the first home buyer, downsizer or investor alike. With everything at your fingertips, this is one not to be missed.

Description:
Big Opportunity
What would you do with almost 5 acres of prime land uniquely positioned for easy access to city, coast and country?
Currently enjoying all of the spaciousness, the charming brick and tile home is surrounded by mature trees and lawns. With a rural outlook from every window, it is hard to believe that the beaches and bright lights of Ocean Grove are only moments away. The home features two separate living zones that both make the most of their sunny position, there are also three bedrooms, all with built in robes; and a family sized bathroom is centrally located. Other highlights consist of gas ducted heating and cooking; European style laundry; plentiful storage; polished timber flooring; and a Coonara wood fire. Outdoor entertaining on the north facing deck is easily accessed from the open plan living area.
The property also includes a fully self contained bungalow with open plan living, near new kitchen and a queen sized bedroom with built in robes and an en-suite. Finally there is also a large implement shed with separate workshop space, kitchenette and ample space to park the caravan and boat.
Paddocks, orchard, established trees, chook run, dam, rainwater tanks and veggie garden all add a touch of countryside appeal. The proximity of shops and amenities guarantees convenience and easy living.
Whether you choose to leave this 20,230m² (approx) parcel in tact and land bank for the future or sub-divide and develop (STCA), either way this is a rare and exciting opportunity that any astute investor will appreciate.

Description:
Scarce as Hen's Teeth 1189m2
Blocks over 1000m2 do no come along every day! Couple this with a premium location close to the town centre of Drysdale and you have a win, win situation. one of the peninsula's most prominent towns with great schools and medical facilities, shopping and abundance of cafes and sporting pursuits. Drysdale has it all! Close proximity to Geelong and Avalon Airport. Build your new home amongst quality properties in this quiet court location. This large allotment offers opportunity to spead your wings and not feel couped in by close neighbours. This vacant land may be able to be subdivided STCA.

Description:
Superb Family Lifestyle
Embracing modern styling, this property will excite and entice buyers with high expectations for a quality family home.
This home boasts 4 spacious bedrooms, 3 with large built in robes, the master bedroom offering walk in robe and full ensuite. All bedrooms throughout feature large windows, allowing sun drenched rooms. The astute buyer will appreciate all the quality features about the home with its functional flowing floorplan featuring an open plan lounge, kitchen, dining room that leads out to a courtyard area. Equipped with stainless quality appliances and stainless dishwasher, the kitchen will provide you with ample space and storage. The north facing backyard has been beautifully designed and landscaped for low maintenance.
Being located in the highly sought-after Estuary Estate, you are spoilt with all the amenities the estate has to offer with a recreation reserve and playgrounds only 100 meters away, access to public transport at your doorstep, a multitude of shopping options at the Gateway Shopping Centre and access to the Geelong CBD 15 minutes drive away. 19 Estuary Boulevard, has everything any growing family could want.
If you are looking at starting or growing your portfolio then this is one to put on your list. With an anticipated rent of $400.00 - $420.00 per week this really is a perfect opportunity.
An inspection is a must for you to fully appreciate what this home really has to offer!

Description:
Fabulous Rural Lifestyle Opportunity in Exclusive Hamlet
Offers closing Monday 18th November (Unless Sold Prior)
The Feel
Approx 3.7 picturesque acres of prime land, with a classic rural weatherboard home nestled perfectly within, captures the northerly aspect & fully landscaped garden views. Privacy & tranquility are on offer, with the privilege of space, potential for hobby farm with large shed, & the rewards of a self-sufficient lifestyle. Inspired by classic Victorian era, this stunning home meets today’s modern needs.
The Facts
-Meandering driveway lined with established Manchurian Pear trees & metal edging, creates a stunning first impression
-Gardens & lawn extend beyond the large north-facing alfresco with pictorial outlooks over expansive lawns for backyard cricket, footy & entertaining
-The custom built home is welcoming, brimming with contemporary charm & gables that hark back to 1920s influences
-Indoors, the 4 BR children’s wing is zonable directly off the entry, complete with BIRs & dedicated separate lounge with 100% wool carpet for children to spread out, plus access to patio
-Sunny family bathroom with large shower, bath, vanity & separate toilet
-In the living hub, north & east windows frame the expansive lawn views to the built-in cubby/ adventure park, skate ramp & in-ground trampoline
-Moreton Bay Figs & English Oak Trees will grow to 30mtrs in future, enriching the vista
-Bluestone TV unit & mantel with Coonara style fire place are highlights in the living area
-The open plan social kitchen boasts a trio of chandelier pendants & is adjoined by the ultimate, huge butler’s pantry
-Expansive caesarstone benchtops & shaker style cabinetry complement the hardwood floors
-Quality appliances include dual electric ovens, induction cooktop & dishwasher
-Soft close joinery extends to the pantry complete with ample drawers & fridge space
-Kitchen has west views over French potager garden (ready for planting) & a stunning bluestone ‘Chook Palace’/versatile garden shed
-Dining area seamlessly flows into living area & entertaining patio
-Bespoke built-in cabinetry provides the perfect dining room buffet
-Retreat to the sophisticated Master BR, with ‘Lee Broom’ hanging pendant crystal bulbs
-Large WIR & en suite with caesarstone bench, in situ shower & separate toilet complete this private parent’s zone
-Dedicated parents lounge provides the ultimate relaxing sanctuary
-The generous laundry is ideal for farm life featuring great storage & direct yard access
-Ideally located powder room with separate toilet
-The double garage opens directly into kitchen for easy unloading of shopping
-Ducted refrigerated cooling & electric heating zoned throughout the home for all season comfort
-Endless space & possibility to value add with a pool & tennis court
-Secure, rabbit-proof fences wrap the entire boundary
-Potential to fence in a paddock for livestock
-Plane trees will grow to 30mtrs on forecourt, with open air parking
-2,000L & 31,700L rainwater tanks support the garden and lawns
-Separate driveway access to concealed 1,800sqm (approx) yard & 9x11m shed with high clearance, 3mtr width, roller door ideal for ‘toy’ storage (caravan/boat/trailers/cars). Powered & plumbed (ready for connection to septic system)
-Borrowed views of mature eucalypts protect & privatise
-10mins to world class beaches, 5mins to supermarkets, 20mins to Geelong CBD
-Central Bellarine placement close to renowned wineries, restaurants & producers
-Close to many prestigious Geelong secondary schools

Description:
Private Bush Haven On Over 1.5 Acres
The Feel:
Set across over 1.5 acres of native landscape in prestigious Wallington, this uniquely beautiful and impeccably updated home offers the best of both coast and country only moments to Ocean Grove.
First-time rural property owners will love the flat block, fully fenced with fruiting trees ready for a semi self-sufficient lifestyle, with the convenience of Paddock Café 200m away when you need it!
The Facts:
-3-4BR home with expansive glazing capturing native outlooks
-Private and peaceful block spanning over 1.5 acres
-Short 5min drive to Ocean Grove shops and surf beaches
-New kitchen with 90cm oven, Asko d/w and plenty of pot drawers
-Spacious laundry with generous cupboard space for linen/pantry
-Dining with built-in seating and lounge with wood-fire
-Sun-filled north and east facing entertaining decks
-Master BR boasts deck access with modern ensuite and corner spa
-Good-sized minor BRs with built-in storage + home office/4th BR
-Traditional style bathroom with claw foot bath and timber vanity
-New carpet to main living zone, floating floors to entry and hall
-Ducted heating and cooling throughout, ceiling fans
-Easy 200m walk to Paddock Café for morning coffee or lunch
-Colourful rose arbour, fruit orchard and fenced vegetable garden
-9x12m garage with side roller door access, circular paved driveway
-Moments to surf beaches, wineries and coastal towns of the Bellarine
The Owner Loves….
“I love having breakfast and looking out towards the trees that capture the morning sun, and often sit on the front deck to get the last of the sun in winter. It’s a really quiet and private spot yet still close to town; and being walking distance for coffee and a bite to eat makes for a great lifestyle.”

Description:
The Best of Both Worlds
Do you dream of be able to bring your children up with open spaces to be able to kick the footy, play cricket on Xmas Day, maybe a pony or two, or just be able to run and climb trees? If that's not enough to entice you, how about pack the car with the surfboards and head down the road to one of Victoria's best surf beaches and be on the sand in 10 mins. If you want to get out of suburbia and spread your wings then seriously consider what this lifestyle could do for you.
Imagine waking up surrounded by towering gum trees, collecting fresh eggs for breakfast, feeding the horse and then enjoying a 5 minute walk to the picturesque local Wallington Primary School with the children, or, in a short walk they can catch the bus to one of the local Bellarine Secondary Schools. Situated on almost 3 acres (1.18 hectares) this 4 bedroom residence offers a wonderful opportunity to enjoy a prized rural lifestyle with the added benefit of being just minutes from schools, shops, award winning wineries and the beach. The home sits amongst an established garden that includes beds of roses, a variety of native shrubs including glorious protea bushes and your very own orchard. This generous family home offers warmth and versatility, with open plan kitchen/living/dining, in addition to a more formal separate lounge and dining area. Four generous bedrooms all with BIR will suit growing families, whilst a well positioned central bathroom with separate WC/powder room and an ensuite in the master will certainly appeal. Busy breakfast mornings are made easier in the country style kitchen including a breakfast bar, electric oven and cooktop with plenty of storage. Comfort is assured year round with ducted heating and cooling and an open fireplace for those wintry nights. Outside, you will love entertaining family and friends on the covered alfresco deck, perfect for that weekend BBQ. Further features of the property incl, 2 large water tanks, spacious laundry with external access and an oversized double lock up garage incorporating a workshop/storage shed measuring 7.6m wide x 15.3m long. The roller door measures 3.6m wide x 2.8m high. This wonderful property offers the comfort and convenience of the rural lifestyle, you have always dreamed about, with the potential for those with green thumbs to get creative in the garden.

Address: 98 Country Club Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Blue Chip Locale Golf Course Access!
Situated in a blue-chip Clifton Springs locale, this humble abode offers more than meets the eye! With direct access to hole 3 of the Clifton Springs Golf Course and with the Bay just a short stroll away, this home is sure to delight.
Offering a multitude of options for first home buyers, investors, downsizers or those wanting a project, the home is perfect as is or ready for someone to put their own stamp on. First impressions count and upon entry to the home, you're welcomed into a spacious light-filled lounge, which offers sublime front garden views and study nook. The kitchen is equipped with electric cooking, dishwasher, built-in-pantry and ample storage whilst overlooking the dining area which effortlessly flows via sliding doors to an outdoor courtyard. The master bedroom sits at the fore and hosts built-in-robes and ensuite with vanity, shower and toilet, while the two remaining bedrooms, also with built-in-robes, sit from the central hallway. This wing of the home is serviced by a large family bathroom with shower, vanity and bath, with the separate toilet and laundry with outdoor access completing this cute as a button abode.
As pretty as a picture, the manicured gardens both front and back are low maintenance and are the perfect place for those wanting to tinker, with an enclosed fernery, which could be used in a multitude of ways also on offer.
Additional features include: 604m2 block, heating and cooling, alarm system, SLUG, secure front fence and gate and side access with enough room for multiple cars, boats, caravans and everything in between!
Location is forever, and it's not every day that you can secure an entry level home, with so much potential and with direct Golf Course access. With all major amenities, public transport, schools and the best of the Bellarine lifestyle at your fingertips, don't let this rare opportunity pass by.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Rural Resort Living Close to the Coast
Here is resort living in the country. Koonje, which, in indigenous terms, translates to meeting place on high ground and is the original home site of the Rhinds family. Set on 4.0 ha - 10 acres approx. in Wallington and like its namesake it has numerous spots to come together with friends and family.
It is currently offered as one parcel of land with two dwellings, but there is a permit pending for a 2 lot subdivision which means you could sell part of the land to reduce the cost of the house and remaining land or keep it all together knowing that you have given yourself an immediate uplift in value by formalising the subdivision.
Showcasing five bedrooms, home office, gym, expansive open-plan living area overlooking an in ground swimming pool, spa and an indoor/outdoor entertaining zone, self-contained unit and multiple lounges.
Oozing style and space the estate also features an orchard, town water and tanks totalling 125,000lts, oversized sheds for farm machinery, workshop, vehicle spaces, double LUG, tennis court and groomed land.
Let yourself be immersed in the tranquillity of rural living. Nearby is Wallington Primary School, only a few minutes away from the village centre of Ocean Grove, be on the beach in 5 minutes & 20 minutes to Geelong. Call Peter or Chris today for a life changing inspection!

Description:
Barrabool
Quality Rural Lifestyle and Investment
In The Blue Ribbon Heart of the Barrabool Hills
• 2 Acres (0.80Ha) of prime elevated positioned land
• Quality 3 Bedroom brick veneer homestead, 2 living areas, set in established parkland setting
• American barn shedding, garaging, secured by security system
• Securely watered by rain water storage
Situated in a tightly held and capital appreciating region in the blue ribbon heart of the Barrabool Hills. 2 mins Ceres, 3 mins Ring Road, 10 mins Geelong (Bay and Beaches), 15 mins Surf Coast, 15 mins Avalon International Airport, 50 mins Melbourne and International Airport
Auction: Saturday 2nd November at 11am onsite
Inspection: Strictly by appointment with Agents
Nick Myer 0427 610 278
Ken Drysdale 0409 195 470

Description:
IMMACULATE HOME IN A DESIRABLE LOCATION
This wonderful home set on approx 588m2 features a light & bright north facing front lounge flowing through to an open plan living, dining and modern kitchen at the rear with a superb elevated deck overlooking a lovely landscaped garden. Comprising four comfortable bedrooms including Master with WIR & ensuite, ducted heating and reverse cycle split system for year round comfort. Outside enjoys a fantastic double carport & garage at the end of an extended driveway which will comfortably accommodate cars, boats or caravans! Ideally situated in the seaside town of Clifton Springs, this immaculate home has been lovingly maintained and is ideally suited for families or those looking to retire allowing you to enjoy the spectacular lifestyle on offer here on the Bellarine Peninsula!
